snippet: Behind every nonpartisan institution, the right sees the malevolent hand of a liberal cabal. Just look at the latest outrageous charge by the far right that an improvement in the jobs report must have been manipulated.
abstract: Editorial condemns the Republican Party for continuing to see Pres Obama as the center of a malevolent liberal conspiracy to upend truth; contends that by attempting to discredit reports by important nonpolitical institutions that are seen as even marginally beneficial to Obama's re-election chances, Republicans are doing long-term damage to citizens' trust in government.
lead_paragraph: Behind every nonpartisan institution, the right sees the malevolent hand of a liberal cabal. Just look at the latest outrageous charge by the far right that an improvement in the jobs report must have been manipulated.
